content: @Grahame Grieve Do the downloadable xml definitions for code generation contain the maturity level and ballot status of resources somewhere? I haven't seen them.
yes they are extensions on the structure definitions
I found one for maturity (fmm) in the structure definitions of resources, but not the ballot status. I do see that one in the codesystems, valuesets.
I also don't see maturity in the profiles-types.json file
we don't track maturity for profiles yet. a to do for me. I thought ballot status was on the resources... did you look in the current build? I only added it a few weeks ago
I was looking at the 3.2.0 download when I noticed it.
bizarre. I don't put it on the generated profiles. I can't believe that I don't...
fixing it now, though it will only be in current build
That's fine. I'm just using it to emit some comments into generated code
